rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a bone counter on The Siege at Cutler's Corral. When you do, you may return target creature card with mana value less than or equal to the number of bone counters on The Siege at Cutler's Corral from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at end of combat.
flavor_text: [i]Nox's ill-fated siege lasted twenty-three hours. He had an army, but the Cutlers had two guns each and a storeroom filled with silver bullets.[/i]
